itunes:title: Deuteronomy Week 4 with Elizabeth Woodson
title: Deuteronomy Week 4 with Elizabeth Woodson
description:
It’s the last week of our Deuteronomy series, and Raechel and Amanda are joined by author and teacher, Elizabeth Woodson. Together, they read through the beautiful summary of Moses’s life in these final chapters and how Jesus is the true and better Moses. Elizabeth challenges us to respond to the story of Israel—and all of Scripture—by examining our hearts, the holiness of God, and our new covenant in Christ.   


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 93 of the She Reads Truth Deuteronomy reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Deuteronomy collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/deuteronomy-week-4-with-elizabeth-woodson
